lines.text: [as his siblings return to the nest carrying large, dangerous game animals, Beaky laconically flaps back with his claw wrapped around a barely visible insect]

[singing cheerfully]
I'm bringin' home a baby bumblebee!
My little Killer, the spitting image of his papa. Ptooie!
You little shriveled-up, infinitecimal piece of sh... shoe leather.
Oh, what is-a happened to my little baby? My little bambino! Oh, where is-a my killer?
Oh, my little killer, my little bambino... Oh, where's-a my killer...
My baby... So! I send you out-a for meat, but you always-a come-a home with de empty fingers! You never, never bring-a home-a one teensy weensy piece of a meat-a!

[being held by his tail by Beaky and hanging beside the cliff, invisible to Mamma Buzzard]
Well now, I, um, I wouldn't say that...
